text: Hi, first post here. I’m new to HubSpot and I have a default rich text being incorporated in the main website, which includes a phone number and text. In the website, it also shows an icon. But, there’s no image link to an icon anywhere and only has an Id attribute which I’m assuming has the properties of a background image applied to it. I have no clue what’s the best way to navigate all the CSS files quickly and efficiently in order to find this Id. Any help would be great. I also do not have any global CSS stylesheets included.
Hello- has anyone figured out a workaround for HubSpot’s lack of a mobile SDK? Fb messenger working? Would love to hear what others settled on. TY!
